line.comment: * Returns the actual progress of the $level goal.
* Add-Ons 1.3: Cleaned up fame and power sections - removed redundant code.
* Special ascension (insane only). 3 tasks are pulled from any of the 11 tasks, using level for task ID.

sval.val: Returns the actual progress of the $level goal.
Add-Ons 1.3: Cleaned up fame and power sections - removed redundant code.
Special ascension (insane only). 3 tasks are pulled from any of the 11 tasks, using level for task ID.
